content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to get a text summary of an article on the National Geographic website, but received an error message. I then used a command to Google interesting resources related to exploration and learning, which returned a list of websites including National Geographic, NOAA, NASA, and others.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.nationalgeographic.com/", "question": "Can you find any interesting resources related to exploration and learning on the National Geographic website?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: a collection of articles, videos, podcasts, and other resources available on the National Geographic website covering a wide range of topics including travel, environment, animals, history, culture, and science. It is possible to find interesting resources related to exploration and learning on the website.\n\nLinks: [' (https://www.nationalgeographic.com/)', ' (https://www.nationalgeographic.com/search)', 'Newsletters (https://www.nationalgeographic.com/newsletters/signup)', 'Subscribe (https://www.nationalgeographic.com/subscribe)', 'Subscribe (https://magazines.nationalgeographic.com/subscribe/latest-stories)']", type='action_result')]
"""
